page.title: 17CLUBS FOR ADULTS
page.content: Clubs and activities for adults in Creswell or mainly organised around the Miners' Welfare, working men's clubs, pubs and the church. The pubs have their darts and dominoes teams while the Institute has a Country and Western Club and a branch of the British Legion. Behind the Institute there is a cricket ground, a bowling green and a football pitch where the different teams play their matches. Lots of men keep racing pigeons in lofts on their allotment gardens or in their own back gardens. There are lots of competitions to find the fastest racing pigeon. Lots of women like to play Bingo at the local Bingo Hall. Creswell church has a choir and a Floral Arts Club.
